execution_quality: Appropriate and minimal - the agent correctly received and acknowledged validator messages without unnecessary intervention, allowing the validation workflow to proceed naturally.

follow_up_pattern: Continue validation workflow with additional spec files; validators will report on more sections (crypto.org appears to be in progress based on truncated message).
